project_descr: The goal of the project is to assist country's flood recovery efforts in the Polog Region.

outputs.output_descr: The communities of the City of Tetovo and the Polog region benefit from the reconstructed flood/sediment control infrastructure, flash-flood early-warning system and the improved discharge capacity of torrential streambeds
donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO

project_title: reducing flood risk in the polog region
